titleStmt.title: The muses farewel to popery & slavery, or, A collection of miscellany poems, satyrs, songs, &c. made by the most eminent wits of the nation, as the shams, intreagues, and plots of priests and Jesuits gave occasion.
Muses farewel to popery & slavery.

editionStmt.edition: The second edition, with large additions, most of them never before printed.

notesStmt.note: Cf. Case, A.E. A bibliography of English poetical miscellanies, 1521-1750. Oxford, 1935, p. 133 no. 191 (1)(b)
Published in 1697 along with A supplement to the Muses farewel under title: Poems on affairs of state, the second part. Cf. BM, v. 167, col. 562.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
